name: Mini AI Game
description:
This was for an Artificial Intelligence assignment in the 2nd semester of my Game Programming Program at George Brown.  It has been improved upon in my 5th semester, both versions are available.

It was created using C++ with SDL. 

I used free art assets from online: 

  • https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack 
  • https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
